run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication.ConnectionToClient
This is the run method used by the server to start the client After creating the object streams to the client, it asks the desired nickname It loops continuing to listen for incoming objects from the connection and notifies the handlers according to the objects received Upon failure of any kind it closes the connection
